PageWidgetPortable.Title: Leads em Suspecção
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.FASE IN (1) AND A.SUBFASE NOT IN (2,30)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdLeadSuspect</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Contas em Suspecção</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>purple-wisteria</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Leads em Relacionamento
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.FASE IN (6) </CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdLeadRelacionamento</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Contas em Prospecção com Oportunidade</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>green-haze</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidade Públicas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS IN (1,2,14) AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE PUBLICOPRIVADO = 1)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_PUBLICAS</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidade Públicas</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>grey-gallery</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Privada
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.STATUS IN (1,2,14) AND A.PESSOA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE PUBLICOPRIVADO = 2)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_PRIVADAS</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Privada</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>grey-cascade</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Vencidas
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.DATAFECHAMENTO < @HOJE AND A.STATUS NOT IN (3,5,9,10,11,12,13)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdOportunidadeVencida</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Vencidas</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>grey-silver</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades do Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>MONTH(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdOportunidadeMes</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades do Mês</Description> <Icon>fa fa-line-chart</Icon> <Color>grey-silver</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades em aberto (Mês)
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>MONTH(A.DATAFECHAMENTO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATAFECHAMENTO) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdOportunidadeFechamentoMes</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Fechamento (Mês)</Description> <Icon>fa fa-dollar</Icon> <Color>grey-silver</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Públicas Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.PESSOA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE PUBLICOPRIVADO = 1) AND MONTH(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_PUBLICAS_MES</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Públicas Mês</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>grey-gallery</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades Privadas Mês
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.PESSOA IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS WHERE PUBLICOPRIVADO = 2) AND MONTH(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = MONTH(GETDATE()) AND YEAR(A.DATAINCLUSAO) = YEAR(GETDATE())</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>REDIRECT_OPORTUNIDADES_PRIVADAS_MES</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades Privadas Mês</Description> <Icon>fa fa-check</Icon> <Color>grey-cascade</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Oportunidades aguardando autorização
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <TileAttributes> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>true</CanInsert> <EntityViewName>K_CRM_PESSOAOPORTUNIDADES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CompanyFilterMode>0</CompanyFilterMode> <CriteriaWhereClause>A.FILIAL = @FILIAL AND A.STATUS IN (11,12,13)</CriteriaWhereClause> <CommandName>cmdCancelaOportunidade</CommandName> <Value>CODIGO</Value> <Description>Oportunidades com itens aguardando aprovação</Description> <Icon>fa fa-clock-o</Icon> <Color>red</Color> <ValueAggregation>1</ValueAggregation> <TileType>1</TileType> </TileAttributes>
